description: This Kotlin source file defines a Basic AI object for a chess application, which selects a random legal move from the current board state, running asynchronously on Dispatchers.Default.

classes.name: BasicAi
classes.description: An object representing a basic artificial intelligence for the chess game, capable of selecting a random legal move.

methods.name: chooseMove
methods.description: Suspended function that returns a randomly chosen legal move from the list of moves available on the given board, or null if none are available.
